description:
Welcome to the land of road. Endurance and performance, the Synapse delivers equal parts of each. For a personal fitness goal or your first fondo, this sporty ride is nicely spec'd out. The frame's geometry keeps you comfortably supported, so you thrive on the road without the post-ride ache through the shoulders. It's fun for short sprints, longer days, and everything in between. However you measure success, you'll finish each group ride or daily commute looking forward to the next one.

  • Smartform C2 alloy frame and carbon fork, with endurance road bike geometry
  • 2x9 drive train pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • Shimano Sora groupset with an FSA compact crank
  • Mechanical disc brakes
  • KMC Z9 chain
  • Double-wall alloy rims
  • 700x28c clincher tires
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
